ya... a week or two... you cant do much unless you already know the basics...

however if u are not a totally noob you can basically rebuild your space empire from scratch (unless they change the game mechanics a lot)

i mean...

flying a ship to low orbit is 5min in 1X time warp; you can build a station with a few fuel tanks and habitat module in an hour

and flying a ship to Minmus and Mun takes no more than 10min IRL time; another other hour or two is enough for the kethane/ ISA MapSat (if they still work which i suspect it's not gonna happen)

and you can fly an Eve ship in day1 game time and ~day35 to moho and ~day 45 to Duna and so... and you dont time warp the interplanet transit (you fly the ship to orbit and do the burns and leave it there and fly other things meanwhile)

this can all be done in like 5 or 6 hr game time
